input.heading: Input data
input.description: Sensitive data uploaded by the user which describes individual data subjects and is in need of anonymization for sharing or analysis purposes

prepared.heading: Prepared data
prepared.description: Sensitive data prepared for anonymization by the user by removing  direct identifiers and reducing to a small number of columns, each containing a small number of categorical values

aggregate.heading: Aggregate data
aggregate.description: Anonymous data aggregated from the prepared data in ways that provide differential privacy (DP) for the overall record count and all counts of short attribute combinations (length ≤ 4)

synthetic.heading: Synthetic data
synthetic.description: Anonymous data synthesized from the aggregate data such that records capture the structure and statistics of the prepared sensitive data while retaining differential privacy (DP)
